subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Derek Jeter was the last link to the glory teams of the mid-1990s and 2000s, and the end of that era is reflected in the Yankees’ failure to reach the playoffs in consecutive seasons for the first time since 1992-1993.
snippet: Derek Jeter was the last link to the glory teams of the mid-1990s and 2000s, and the end of that era is reflected in the Yankees’ failure to reach the playoffs in consecutive seasons for the first time since 1992-1993.
